## Data frame

```{r}
# data frame
Air_trafic <-data.frame(
  
  Airports = c("Heathrow","Gatwick","Stansted","Luton","Southend","London_City"),
  
  locations = c("Hillingdon","West_Sussex","Essex","Bedfordshire","Newham","Essex"),
  
  take_offs = c(1300,350,1141,140,7,135),
  
  long_flights = c(TRUE,TRUE,TRUE,FALSE,FALSE,FALSE),
  
  category = c("huge", "big","huge","medium","small","medium" )
)

#renames
colnames(Air_trafic)<-c("London_Airports","airport_location","flight_takeoffs","type_of_flight","airport_size")

str(Air_trafic)

summary(Air_trafic)

# new collum
Air_trafic$Density <-ifelse(Air_trafic$flight_takeoffs>1000, "high","low")

Air_trafic
```
